name: The Faceless
description:
You have been thrown into an unknown territory, your task is to find and clear all enemies. As you progress through the game, you explore the abandoned buildings and industrial areas. Third Person Shooter. Explore the area and its buildings, collect ammo, protection and medical kits. Move on foot or by car.

Controls in the game WASD - movement.
Left mouse button - shoot.
F - get in and out of the car.
L - flashlight.
R - reload.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay.
